bio: I'm a passionate software engineer with a unique blend of technical expertise and creative thinking. My journey in technology began with a curiosity about how digital experiences can enhance human creativity and solve real-world problems. I believe in building technology that not only functions flawlessly but also delights users and makes a positive impact.
highlights: Full-stack development with modern web technologies

education.description: Focus on software engineering, HCI, and creative technologies
Excited to bring my skills to innovative projects
